betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Secrets, secrets, secrets...
How is it that, in such a vast universe, some things are known to only a handful of beings? 
Why are jealousy and fear so strong, to push people into holding on to every tittle thing they can? 
Why? Well, likely I will never know.
It does bring me hope that, despite this, there exist individuals capable of sharing their own power, their own secrets, with others. Thanks to them, I now know that the right thing is to divulge the secrets of Lunalus, to make others aware of what the Shyre Empire was hiding.
After having seen all of this, it truly is remarkable that the Arbiter, the paradigm of Order, decided to share everything they knew with the Testificates.
